parameters.name: Description
parameters.value:
To  check  “ Refer to PPMC “ Flow to  Activate Policy For below mentioned Scenario 
Product Name : Arogya Plus
Policy Type : Family Non Floater 
Family Size : 4A
Policy Tenure : 3 Year
Zone : South
TPA name :  “ Health Assure “
 
M1 : Self : 28 Years
SI : 300000
Premium : 8900

M2 : Spouse  : 38 Years
SI : 300000
Premium : 8900

M3 : Mother  : 58 Years
SI : 300000
Premium : 8900
PED : Arthritis/ osteoarthritis/ Rhematoid arthritis

M4 : Father  : 59 Years
SI : 300000
Premium : 8900
PED : Hemophilia 

Level 1 : Refer to UWR
From UWR role || Member 2 || Select below listed Additional test & save also take medical decision as "refer for additional test"
AEC (Absolute Eosinophil Count) -70
APTT (Activated Partial Thromboplastin Time) -175
ESR (Erythrocyte Sedimentation Rate) - 35
From UWR role || Member 3 || Select PPMC package CAT 1 & save also take medical decision as "refer for PPMC" 
From UWR role || Member 4 || Accept with PED

Level 2 : Refer to PPMC
PPMC Dashboard || Member 3 || Update medical Status as No show
Note : Additional test charges should get reflected

Level3: Refer to Sale
M3: Reconsider_Phone number update

Level 4:  Refer to PPMC
M3_Report uploaded

Level 5 : Refer To UWR
From UWR role || Member 3 || Select medical decision as " Accept with PED"

Level 6: Refer for additional test 
PPMC Dashboard || Member 2|| Update medical Status as Report Uploaded
Note : PPMC Charges should be 990

Level 7 : Refer To UWR
From UWR role || Member 2 || Select medical decision as " Accept"

Level 8 : COL review/COL
Policy should get issued
Collection Mode : Demand Draft
OPD limit :
Mem 1 : 4000
Mem 2 : 4000
Mem 3 : 500
Mem 4 : 500
